page.title: 08GAMES AT HOME
page.content: Games played indoors alone:- Cards, computer, Dominoes, Drawing. Dressing up, Lego, Painting, Pool, Snooker, Sindy(dolls) Star wars Television Games INDOORS ACCOMPANIED Action man, Bingo, Buckaroo Cards, Chess, Cluedo, Dominoes, Doctor Doctor, Draughts, Fox and Hounds, Game of Life, Hangman, Lego, Noughts and Crosses, Othello, Scrabble,Snakes and Ladders, School OUTDOORS ALONE Bicycle, Make believe games OUTDOORS ACCOMPANIED Cricket, Chasing games, Den, Hide and Seek, Snowballs, Team Games, Television Games.
